USB_ClassInfo_Audio_Device_t Speaker_Audio_Interface

Detailed Description

Main source file for the AudioOutput demo. This file contains the main tasks of the demo and is responsible for the initial application hardware configuration.

Function Documentation

Event handler for the library USB Configuration Changed event.

Event handler for the library USB Connection event.

Event handler for the library USB Disconnection event.

Event handler for the library USB Unhandled Control Request event.

int main ( void   ) 

Main program entry point. This routine contains the overall program flow, including initial setup of all components and the main program loop.

void ProcessNextSample ( void   ) 

Processes the next audio sample by reading the last ADC conversion and writing it to the audio interface, each time the sample reload timer period elapses to give a constant sample rate.

void SetupHardware ( void   ) 

Configures the board hardware and chip peripherals for the demo's functionality.

Variable Documentation

USB_ClassInfo_Audio_Device_t Speaker_Audio_Interface
Initial value:
    {
        .Config =
            {
                .StreamingInterfaceNumber = 1,

                .DataOUTEndpointNumber    = AUDIO_STREAM_EPNUM,
                .DataOUTEndpointSize      = AUDIO_STREAM_EPSIZE,
            },
    }

LUFA Audio Class driver interface configuration and state information. This structure is passed to all Audio Class driver functions, so that multiple instances of the same class within a device can be differentiated from one another.
